name: Louisiana Chicken & Rice

ingredients.name: Louisiana Seasoning or Cajun Fries Seasoning

preparation: Place rice and water in Multipurpose Steamer. Top with tray; microwave, uncovered, on high for 16–18 minutes, or until tender.
Meanwhile, heat oil in Sauté Pan over medium-high heat. Add chicken fillets and cook 6–8 min. Stir in veggies and seasoning; cook for 4 min, or until veggies are soft. Remove from heat.
When rice is cooked, add to the pan; stir to combine.
Divide into 4 bowls. Top each bowl with 2 tbsp of sour cream and add toppings, if desired.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 2 cups mixed greens and 1 tbsp prepared Epicure Dressing.
